Event.name: Visit_host_stay
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Visitor</fen> is located with a <fen>Host</fen> for a visit.</def-root>

Arg.name: Visitor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The sentient entity that is temporarily with the <fen>Host</fen> in order to fulfil some <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Host
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Host</fen> welcomes the <fen>Visitor</fen> to his/her location, with which he/she is permanently associated. The <fen>Host</fen> allows the <fen>Visitor</fen> use of resources to accomplish a <fen>Purpose</fen>. During the visit, the <fen>Visitor</fen> matches location with the <fen>Host</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Dependent_state
Arg.definition: <def-root>A state (of the <fen>Visitor</fen>) that results as a consequence of the <fen>Visitor</fen> being situated with the <fen>Host</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The activity that is enabled by the <fen>Host</fen> and that the <fen>Visitor</fen> wishes to achieve.</def-root>

Arg.name: Normal_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Visitor</fen> normally resides in or is (permanently) associated with.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which a visit is made.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time that the <fen>Visitor</fen> spends with the <fen>Host</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any overall description of the details of the visit, either in terms of how it matches other events (<ment>the same way</ment>) or in terms of states of the <fen>Visitor</fen> that affect the action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the position of the <fen>Visitor</fen> during the visit.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action of the <fen>Visitor</fen> that enables their visit.</def-root>

Arg.name: Iterations
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The number of instances of the described event.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>A characterization of the average number of times a visit happens over a period of time.</def-root>

Arg.name: Host_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Host_location is the location permanently associated with the <fen>Host</fen>, and which the <fen>Visitor</fen> stays at temporarily for the acheiving of some <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>
